item.description:
Gina Alyse Lengyel
Monday, January 21, 2008 (7pm?9pm)

Out of the NYC jungle, photo agent Gina Alyse Lengyel is a high-energy pro who guides rookies and veterans alike through the battlefield of estimating bids. Strategic planning consists of gathering intel, knowing the right questions to ask, and understanding usage fee options and ?Ã  la carte? estimates. Come prepared to learn what it takes to survive on this rocky battleground, and ultimately win the Bidding War.

Gina Alyse Lengyel founded Vue Management in 1995 as an agency for creative fine-art based fashion, advertising, and editorial photographers. Vue later expanded to offer hair, make-up, styling, set and prop, art direction, and custom scenic and illustration services. This year, Gina Alyse further expanded Vue to include Vue/Licensing for corporate fashion and fine-art synergy projects.
Gina Alyse has a caring, dynamic, and outspoken way of educating within the industry. Her industry-wide expertise and contacts as a photo and artist agent, producer, media buyer for print and video, photo editor, educator, and consultant enable her to develop and grow both new and established artists? talents and commercial viability.

Pre-registration is required for this program.
Cost:
CIPNE Members - Free, Non-members - $35, Full-time Students - $15
Go here to register (Non-members may pay by PayPal) http://www.cipne.org/...
Please note: on-line registration closes January 18th.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: CIPNE: Event Winning the Bidding War
